00025 /***************************************************************************
00026 OgreKeyTarget.h  -  
00027     Handles the adding and removing of KeyListeners.
00028 
00029     Components that process the Key Event should subclass this class 
00030     and call processKeyEvent when that event is identified.
00031 
00032 -------------------
00033 begin                : Nov 19 2002
00034 copyright            : (C) 2002 by Kenny Sabir
00035 email                : kenny@sparksuit.com
00036 ***************************************************************************/
00037 
00038 #ifndef __KeyTarget_H__
00039 #define __KeyTarget_H__
00040 
00041 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00042 #include "OgreEventTarget.h"
00043 
00044 namespace Ogre {
00045 
00046     class _OgreExport KeyTarget : public EventTarget
00047     {
00048     private:
00049         std::set<KeyListener*> mRemovedListeners;
00050 
00051     protected:
00052         std::set<KeyListener*> mKeyListeners;
00053 
00054     public:
00055         KeyTarget() { }
00056         virtual ~KeyTarget() { }
00057 
00058         void processKeyEvent(KeyEvent* e) ;
00059         void addKeyListener(KeyListener* l) ;
00060         void removeKeyListener(KeyListener* l) ;
00061     };
00062 
00063 
00064 
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00068 #endif //__KeyTarget_H__
